name: Deadly Platform
description:
DEADLY PLATFORM

There is only one rule, do not die. Beat up every challenge on your way to the glory.


  • Seize the traps before you move.
  • You can't continue from the last run if you leave, beware!
  • Be cautious with traps, which can be unmeaningfully hard or annoying.
  • Every trap and parkour will lead you to death if you are not careful. Accommodate or die multiple times.
  • For every trap and parkour you beat, there comes joy and glory.
  • After passing checkpoint, you only have 3 chance. Use it wisely.
  • Don't forget, the faster you finish, the more chantful glory you get against your friends.
